medical_history.chief_complaint: Bilateral myocutaneous eyelid flaps for dorsal nasal defect reconstruction.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient had a modified left radical mastectomy performed previously and was given radiation therapy; the flap procedure was routine and the postoperative course was uneventful until postoperative day 15 when the patient complained of ischemia in the reconstructed breast.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Modified left radical mastectomy, radiation therapy, heavy smoker.
